O

OthelloBoard - Class in game
This class is the implementation of the Board.
OthelloBoard() - Constructor for class game.OthelloBoard
The constructor creates a list of length 36 of all the fields on the board.
OthelloBoard(BoardConfiguration) - Constructor for class game.OthelloBoard
To create a new Board for Othello.
OthelloBoard.Direction - Interface in game
The interface direction is an interface for classes to adhere to.
OthelloGame - Class in game
Represents the Othello (Reversi) Game.
OthelloGame(Player, Player) - Constructor for class game.OthelloGame
Constructs a game of Othello with initial setup: current player is black and the initial board.
OthelloGame(Player, Player, BoardConfiguration) - Constructor for class game.OthelloGame
Constructs a game of Othello with a configuration supplied to the configuration.
OthelloTUI - Class in network.client
The main Othello game class.
OthelloTUI() - Constructor for class network.client.OthelloTUI
 
other() - Method in enum game.Mark
Returns the other mark.
